title: Switches and VNA Software for Automation
affiliations: Department of Astronomy, University of California Berkeley
Radio Astronomy Laboratory, University of California Berkeley
summary: Overview of the automated control software for the Copper Mountain R60 1-port VNA and the SPDT switch network, including basic commands and example scripts for measuring S11 and calibration cycles.

title: Switch Configuration
affiliations: Department of Astronomy, University of California Berkeley
Radio Astronomy Laboratory, University of California Berkeley
summary: Describes the failsafe SPDT switch configuration for EIGSEP’s automatic calibration paths (e.g., OUT→ANT, VNA→O/S/L), design choices, and expected power states during normal observing.
